00036 
00037 btHingeConstraint::btHingeConstraint(btRigidBody& rbA,btRigidBody& rbB, const btVector3& pivotInA,const btVector3& pivotInB,
00038                                                                          const btVector3& axisInA,const btVector3& axisInB, bool useReferenceFrameA)
00039                                                                          :btTypedConstraint(HINGE_CONSTRAINT_TYPE, rbA,rbB),
00040 #ifdef _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00041                                                                          m_limit(),
00042 #endif
00043                                                                          m_angularOnly(false),
00044                                                                          m_enableAngularMotor(false),
00045                                                                          m_useSolveConstraintObsolete(HINGE_USE_OBSOLETE_SOLVER),
00046                                                                          m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame(HINGE_USE_FRAME_OFFSET),
00047                                                                          m_useReferenceFrameA(useReferenceFrameA),
00048                                                                          m_flags(0),
00049                                                                          m_normalCFM(0),
00050                                                                          m_normalERP(0),
00051                                                                          m_stopCFM(0),
00052                                                                          m_stopERP(0)
00053 {
00054         m_rbAFrame.getOrigin() = pivotInA;
00055         
00056         // since no frame is given, assume this to be zero angle and just pick rb transform axis
00057         btVector3 rbAxisA1 = rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().getColumn(0);
00058 
00059         btVector3 rbAxisA2;
00060         btScalar projection = axisInA.dot(rbAxisA1);
00061         if (projection >= 1.0f - SIMD_EPSILON) {
00062                 rbAxisA1 = -rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().getColumn(2);
00063                 rbAxisA2 = rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().getColumn(1);
00064         } else if (projection <= -1.0f + SIMD_EPSILON) {
00065                 rbAxisA1 = rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().getColumn(2);
00066                 rbAxisA2 = rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().getColumn(1);      
00067         } else {
00068                 rbAxisA2 = axisInA.cross(rbAxisA1);
00069                 rbAxisA1 = rbAxisA2.cross(axisInA);
00070         }
00071 
00072         m_rbAFrame.getBasis().setValue( rbAxisA1.getX(),rbAxisA2.getX(),axisInA.getX(),
00073                                                                         rbAxisA1.getY(),rbAxisA2.getY(),axisInA.getY(),
00074                                                                         rbAxisA1.getZ(),rbAxisA2.getZ(),axisInA.getZ() );
00075 
00076         btQuaternion rotationArc = shortestArcQuat(axisInA,axisInB);
00077         btVector3 rbAxisB1 =  quatRotate(rotationArc,rbAxisA1);
00078         btVector3 rbAxisB2 =  axisInB.cross(rbAxisB1);  
00079         
00080         m_rbBFrame.getOrigin() = pivotInB;
00081         m_rbBFrame.getBasis().setValue( rbAxisB1.getX(),rbAxisB2.getX(),axisInB.getX(),
00082                                                                         rbAxisB1.getY(),rbAxisB2.getY(),axisInB.getY(),
00083                                                                         rbAxisB1.getZ(),rbAxisB2.getZ(),axisInB.getZ() );
00084         
00085 #ifndef _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00086         //start with free
00087         m_lowerLimit = btScalar(1.0f);
00088         m_upperLimit = btScalar(-1.0f);
00089         m_biasFactor = 0.3f;
00090         m_relaxationFactor = 1.0f;
00091         m_limitSoftness = 0.9f;
00092         m_solveLimit = false;
00093 #endif
00094         m_referenceSign = m_useReferenceFrameA ? btScalar(-1.f) : btScalar(1.f);
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 btHingeConstraint::btHingeConstraint(btRigidBody& rbA,const btVector3& pivotInA,const btVector3& axisInA, bool useReferenceFrameA)
00100 :btTypedConstraint(HINGE_CONSTRAINT_TYPE, rbA),
00101 #ifdef _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00102 m_limit(),
00103 #endif
00104 m_angularOnly(false), m_enableAngularMotor(false), 
00105 m_useSolveConstraintObsolete(HINGE_USE_OBSOLETE_SOLVER),
00106 m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame(HINGE_USE_FRAME_OFFSET),
00107 m_useReferenceFrameA(useReferenceFrameA),
00108 m_flags(0),
00109 m_normalCFM(0),
00110 m_normalERP(0),
00111 m_stopCFM(0),
00112 m_stopERP(0)
00113 {
00114 
00115         // since no frame is given, assume this to be zero angle and just pick rb transform axis
00116         // fixed axis in worldspace
00117         btVector3 rbAxisA1, rbAxisA2;
00118         btPlaneSpace1(axisInA, rbAxisA1, rbAxisA2);
00119 
00120         m_rbAFrame.getOrigin() = pivotInA;
00121         m_rbAFrame.getBasis().setValue( rbAxisA1.getX(),rbAxisA2.getX(),axisInA.getX(),
00122                                                                         rbAxisA1.getY(),rbAxisA2.getY(),axisInA.getY(),
00123                                                                         rbAxisA1.getZ(),rbAxisA2.getZ(),axisInA.getZ() );
00124 
00125         btVector3 axisInB = rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis() * axisInA;
00126 
00127         btQuaternion rotationArc = shortestArcQuat(axisInA,axisInB);
00128         btVector3 rbAxisB1 =  quatRotate(rotationArc,rbAxisA1);
00129         btVector3 rbAxisB2 = axisInB.cross(rbAxisB1);
00130 
00131 
00132         m_rbBFrame.getOrigin() = rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform()(pivotInA);
00133         m_rbBFrame.getBasis().setValue( rbAxisB1.getX(),rbAxisB2.getX(),axisInB.getX(),
00134                                                                         rbAxisB1.getY(),rbAxisB2.getY(),axisInB.getY(),
00135                                                                         rbAxisB1.getZ(),rbAxisB2.getZ(),axisInB.getZ() );
00136         
00137 #ifndef _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00138         //start with free
00139         m_lowerLimit = btScalar(1.0f);
00140         m_upperLimit = btScalar(-1.0f);
00141         m_biasFactor = 0.3f;
00142         m_relaxationFactor = 1.0f;
00143         m_limitSoftness = 0.9f;
00144         m_solveLimit = false;
00145 #endif
00146         m_referenceSign = m_useReferenceFrameA ? btScalar(-1.f) : btScalar(1.f);
00147 }

00176 #endif

00178 }

00182 btHingeConstraint::btHingeConstraint(btRigidBody& rbA, const btTransform& rbAFrame, bool useReferenceFrameA)
00183 :btTypedConstraint(HINGE_CONSTRAINT_TYPE, rbA),m_rbAFrame(rbAFrame),m_rbBFrame(rbAFrame),
00184 #ifdef _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00185 m_limit(),
00186 #endif
00187 m_angularOnly(false),
00188 m_enableAngularMotor(false),
00189 m_useSolveConstraintObsolete(HINGE_USE_OBSOLETE_SOLVER),
00190 m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame(HINGE_USE_FRAME_OFFSET),
00191 m_useReferenceFrameA(useReferenceFrameA),
00192 m_flags(0),
00193 m_normalCFM(0),
00194 m_normalERP(0),
00195 m_stopCFM(0),
00196 m_stopERP(0)
00197 {
00199 
00200         m_rbBFrame.getOrigin() = m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform()(m_rbAFrame.getOrigin());
00201 #ifndef _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00202         //start with free
00203         m_lowerLimit = btScalar(1.0f);
00204         m_upperLimit = btScalar(-1.0f);
00205         m_biasFactor = 0.3f;
00206         m_relaxationFactor = 1.0f;
00207         m_limitSoftness = 0.9f;
00208         m_solveLimit = false;
00209 #endif
00210         m_referenceSign = m_useReferenceFrameA ? btScalar(-1.f) : btScalar(1.f);
00211 }

00214 
00215 void    btHingeConstraint::buildJacobian()
00216 {
00217         if (m_useSolveConstraintObsolete)
00218         {
00219                 m_appliedImpulse = btScalar(0.);
00220                 m_accMotorImpulse = btScalar(0.);
00221 
00222                 if (!m_angularOnly)
00223                 {
00224                         btVector3 pivotAInW = m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform()*m_rbAFrame.getOrigin();
00225                         btVector3 pivotBInW = m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform()*m_rbBFrame.getOrigin();
00226                         btVector3 relPos = pivotBInW - pivotAInW;
00227 
00228                         btVector3 normal[3];
00229                         if (relPos.length2() > SIMD_EPSILON)
00230                         {
00231                                 normal[0] = relPos.normalized();
00232                         }
00233                         else
00234                         {
00235                                 normal[0].setValue(btScalar(1.0),0,0);
00236                         }
00237 
00238                         btPlaneSpace1(normal[0], normal[1], normal[2]);
00239 
00240                         for (int i=0;i<3;i++)
00241                         {
00242                                 new (&m_jac[i]) btJacobianEntry(
00243                                 m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00244                                 m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00245                                 pivotAInW - m_rbA.getCenterOfMassPosition(),
00246                                 pivotBInW - m_rbB.getCenterOfMassPosition(),
00247                                 normal[i],
00248                                 m_rbA.getInvInertiaDiagLocal(),
00249                                 m_rbA.getInvMass(),
00250                                 m_rbB.getInvInertiaDiagLocal(),
00251                                 m_rbB.getInvMass());
00252                         }
00253                 }
00254 
00255                 //calculate two perpendicular jointAxis, orthogonal to hingeAxis
00256                 //these two jointAxis require equal angular velocities for both bodies
00257 
00258                 //this is unused for now, it's a todo
00259                 btVector3 jointAxis0local;
00260                 btVector3 jointAxis1local;
00261                 
00262                 btPlaneSpace1(m_rbAFrame.getBasis().getColumn(2),jointAxis0local,jointAxis1local);
00263 
00264                 btVector3 jointAxis0 = getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis() * jointAxis0local;
00265                 btVector3 jointAxis1 = getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis() * jointAxis1local;
00266                 btVector3 hingeAxisWorld = getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis() * m_rbAFrame.getBasis().getColumn(2);
00267                         
00268                 new (&m_jacAng[0])      btJacobianEntry(jointAxis0,
00269                         m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00270                         m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00271                         m_rbA.getInvInertiaDiagLocal(),
00272                         m_rbB.getInvInertiaDiagLocal());
00273 
00274                 new (&m_jacAng[1])      btJacobianEntry(jointAxis1,
00275                         m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00276                         m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00277                         m_rbA.getInvInertiaDiagLocal(),
00278                         m_rbB.getInvInertiaDiagLocal());
00279 
00280                 new (&m_jacAng[2])      btJacobianEntry(hingeAxisWorld,
00281                         m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00282                         m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().transpose(),
00283                         m_rbA.getInvInertiaDiagLocal(),
00284                         m_rbB.getInvInertiaDiagLocal());
00285 
00286                         // clear accumulator
00287                         m_accLimitImpulse = btScalar(0.);
00288 
00289                         // test angular limit
00290                         testLimit(m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform());
00291 
00292                 //Compute K = J*W*J' for hinge axis
00293                 btVector3 axisA =  getRigidBodyA().getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis() *  m_rbAFrame.getBasis().getColumn(2);
00294                 m_kHinge =   1.0f / (getRigidBodyA().computeAngularImpulseDenominator(axisA) +
00295                                                          getRigidBodyB().computeAngularImpulseDenominator(axisA));
00296 
00297         }
00298 }

00303 
00304 static inline btScalar btNormalizeAnglePositive(btScalar angle)
00305 {
00306   return btFmod(btFmod(angle, btScalar(2.0*SIMD_PI)) + btScalar(2.0*SIMD_PI), btScalar(2.0*SIMD_PI));
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 
00311 static btScalar btShortestAngularDistance(btScalar accAngle, btScalar curAngle)
00312 {
00313         btScalar result = btNormalizeAngle(btNormalizeAnglePositive(btNormalizeAnglePositive(curAngle) -
00314         btNormalizeAnglePositive(accAngle)));
00315         return result;
00316 }
00317 
00318 static btScalar btShortestAngleUpdate(btScalar accAngle, btScalar curAngle)
00319 {
00320         btScalar tol(0.3);
00321         btScalar result = btShortestAngularDistance(accAngle, curAngle);
00322 
00323           if (btFabs(result) > tol)
00324                 return curAngle;
00325           else
00326                 return accAngle + result;
00327 
00328         return curAngle;
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00332 btScalar btHingeAccumulatedAngleConstraint::getAccumulatedHingeAngle()
00333 {
00334         btScalar hingeAngle = getHingeAngle();
00335         m_accumulatedAngle = btShortestAngleUpdate(m_accumulatedAngle,hingeAngle);
00336         return m_accumulatedAngle;
00337 }
00338 void    btHingeAccumulatedAngleConstraint::setAccumulatedHingeAngle(btScalar accAngle)
00339 {
00340         m_accumulatedAngle  = accAngle;
00341 }
00342 
00343 void btHingeAccumulatedAngleConstraint::getInfo1(btConstraintInfo1* info)
00344 {
00345         //update m_accumulatedAngle
00346         btScalar curHingeAngle = getHingeAngle();
00347         m_accumulatedAngle = btShortestAngleUpdate(m_accumulatedAngle,curHingeAngle);
00348 
00349         btHingeConstraint::getInfo1(info);
00350         
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 void btHingeConstraint::getInfo1(btConstraintInfo1* info)
00355 {
00356 
00357 
00358         if (m_useSolveConstraintObsolete)
00359         {
00360                 info->m_numConstraintRows = 0;
00361                 info->nub = 0;
00362         }
00363         else
00364         {
00365                 info->m_numConstraintRows = 5; // Fixed 3 linear + 2 angular
00366                 info->nub = 1; 
00367                 //always add the row, to avoid computation (data is not available yet)
00368                 //prepare constraint
00369                 testLimit(m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform());
00370                 if(getSolveLimit() || getEnableAngularMotor())
00371                 {
00372                         info->m_numConstraintRows++; // limit 3rd anguar as well
00373                         info->nub--; 
00374                 }
00375 
00376         }
00377 }
00378 
00379 void btHingeConstraint::getInfo1NonVirtual(btConstraintInfo1* info)
00380 {
00381         if (m_useSolveConstraintObsolete)
00382         {
00383                 info->m_numConstraintRows = 0;
00384                 info->nub = 0;
00385         }
00386         else
00387         {
00388                 //always add the 'limit' row, to avoid computation (data is not available yet)
00389                 info->m_numConstraintRows = 6; // Fixed 3 linear + 2 angular
00390                 info->nub = 0; 
00391         }
00392 }
00393 
00394 void btHingeConstraint::getInfo2 (btConstraintInfo2* info)
00395 {
00396         if(m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame)
00397         {
00398                 getInfo2InternalUsingFrameOffset(info, m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbA.getAngularVelocity(),m_rbB.getAngularVelocity());
00399         }
00400         else
00401         {
00402                 getInfo2Internal(info, m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbA.getAngularVelocity(),m_rbB.getAngularVelocity());
00403         }
00404 }

00406 
00407 void    btHingeConstraint::getInfo2NonVirtual (btConstraintInfo2* info,const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB,const btVector3& angVelA,const btVector3& angVelB)
00408 {
00410         testLimit(transA,transB);
00411 
00412         getInfo2Internal(info,transA,transB,angVelA,angVelB);
00413 }
00414 
00415 
00416 void btHingeConstraint::getInfo2Internal(btConstraintInfo2* info, const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB,const btVector3& angVelA,const btVector3& angVelB)
00417 {
00418 
00419         btAssert(!m_useSolveConstraintObsolete);
00420         int i, skip = info->rowskip;
00421         // transforms in world space
00422         btTransform trA = transA*m_rbAFrame;
00423         btTransform trB = transB*m_rbBFrame;
00424         // pivot point
00425         btVector3 pivotAInW = trA.getOrigin();
00426         btVector3 pivotBInW = trB.getOrigin();
00427 #if 0
00428         if (0)
00429         {
00430                 for (i=0;i<6;i++)
00431                 {
00432                         info->m_J1linearAxis[i*skip]=0;
00433                         info->m_J1linearAxis[i*skip+1]=0;
00434                         info->m_J1linearAxis[i*skip+2]=0;
00435 
00436                         info->m_J1angularAxis[i*skip]=0;
00437                         info->m_J1angularAxis[i*skip+1]=0;
00438                         info->m_J1angularAxis[i*skip+2]=0;
00439 
00440                         info->m_J2linearAxis[i*skip]=0;
00441                         info->m_J2linearAxis[i*skip+1]=0;
00442                         info->m_J2linearAxis[i*skip+2]=0;
00443 
00444                         info->m_J2angularAxis[i*skip]=0;
00445                         info->m_J2angularAxis[i*skip+1]=0;
00446                         info->m_J2angularAxis[i*skip+2]=0;
00447 
00448                         info->m_constraintError[i*skip]=0.f;
00449                 }
00450         }
00451 #endif //#if 0
00452         // linear (all fixed)
00453 
00454         if (!m_angularOnly)
00455         {
00456                 info->m_J1linearAxis[0] = 1;
00457                 info->m_J1linearAxis[skip + 1] = 1;
00458                 info->m_J1linearAxis[2 * skip + 2] = 1;
00459 
00460                 info->m_J2linearAxis[0] = -1;
00461                 info->m_J2linearAxis[skip + 1] = -1;
00462                 info->m_J2linearAxis[2 * skip + 2] = -1;
00463         }       
00464 
00465 
00466 
00467 
00468         btVector3 a1 = pivotAInW - transA.getOrigin();
00469         {
00470                 btVector3* angular0 = (btVector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis);
00471                 btVector3* angular1 = (btVector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis + skip);
00472                 btVector3* angular2 = (btVector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis + 2 * skip);
00473                 btVector3 a1neg = -a1;
00474                 a1neg.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00475         }
00476         btVector3 a2 = pivotBInW - transB.getOrigin();
00477         {
00478                 btVector3* angular0 = (btVector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis);
00479                 btVector3* angular1 = (btVector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis + skip);
00480                 btVector3* angular2 = (btVector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis + 2 * skip);
00481                 a2.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00482         }
00483         // linear RHS
00484         btScalar normalErp = (m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_NORM) ? m_normalERP : info->erp;
00485 
00486     btScalar k = info->fps * normalErp;
00487         if (!m_angularOnly)
00488         {
00489                 for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00490                 {
00491                         info->m_constraintError[i * skip] = k * (pivotBInW[i] - pivotAInW[i]);
00492                 }
00493         }
00494         // make rotations around X and Y equal
00495         // the hinge axis should be the only unconstrained
00496         // rotational axis, the angular velocity of the two bodies perpendicular to
00497         // the hinge axis should be equal. thus the constraint equations are
00498         //    p*w1 - p*w2 = 0
00499         //    q*w1 - q*w2 = 0
00500         // where p and q are unit vectors normal to the hinge axis, and w1 and w2
00501         // are the angular velocity vectors of the two bodies.
00502         // get hinge axis (Z)
00503         btVector3 ax1 = trA.getBasis().getColumn(2);
00504         // get 2 orthos to hinge axis (X, Y)
00505         btVector3 p = trA.getBasis().getColumn(0);
00506         btVector3 q = trA.getBasis().getColumn(1);
00507         // set the two hinge angular rows 
00508     int s3 = 3 * info->rowskip;
00509     int s4 = 4 * info->rowskip;
00510 
00511         info->m_J1angularAxis[s3 + 0] = p[0];
00512         info->m_J1angularAxis[s3 + 1] = p[1];
00513         info->m_J1angularAxis[s3 + 2] = p[2];
00514         info->m_J1angularAxis[s4 + 0] = q[0];
00515         info->m_J1angularAxis[s4 + 1] = q[1];
00516         info->m_J1angularAxis[s4 + 2] = q[2];
00517 
00518         info->m_J2angularAxis[s3 + 0] = -p[0];
00519         info->m_J2angularAxis[s3 + 1] = -p[1];
00520         info->m_J2angularAxis[s3 + 2] = -p[2];
00521         info->m_J2angularAxis[s4 + 0] = -q[0];
00522         info->m_J2angularAxis[s4 + 1] = -q[1];
00523         info->m_J2angularAxis[s4 + 2] = -q[2];
00524     // compute the right hand side of the constraint equation. set relative
00525     // body velocities along p and q to bring the hinge back into alignment.
00526     // if ax1,ax2 are the unit length hinge axes as computed from body1 and
00527     // body2, we need to rotate both bodies along the axis u = (ax1 x ax2).
00528     // if `theta' is the angle between ax1 and ax2, we need an angular velocity
00529     // along u to cover angle erp*theta in one step :
00530     //   |angular_velocity| = angle/time = erp*theta / stepsize
00531     //                      = (erp*fps) * theta
00532     //    angular_velocity  = |angular_velocity| * (ax1 x ax2) / |ax1 x ax2|
00533     //                      = (erp*fps) * theta * (ax1 x ax2) / sin(theta)
00534     // ...as ax1 and ax2 are unit length. if theta is smallish,
00535     // theta ~= sin(theta), so
00536     //    angular_velocity  = (erp*fps) * (ax1 x ax2)
00537     // ax1 x ax2 is in the plane space of ax1, so we project the angular
00538     // velocity to p and q to find the right hand side.
00539     btVector3 ax2 = trB.getBasis().getColumn(2);
00540         btVector3 u = ax1.cross(ax2);
00541         info->m_constraintError[s3] = k * u.dot(p);
00542         info->m_constraintError[s4] = k * u.dot(q);
00543         // check angular limits
00544         int nrow = 4; // last filled row
00545         int srow;
00546         btScalar limit_err = btScalar(0.0);
00547         int limit = 0;
00548         if(getSolveLimit())
00549         {
00550 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00551         limit_err = m_limit.getCorrection() * m_referenceSign;
00552 #else
00553         limit_err = m_correction * m_referenceSign;
00554 #endif
00555         limit = (limit_err > btScalar(0.0)) ? 1 : 2;
00556 
00557         }
00558         // if the hinge has joint limits or motor, add in the extra row
00559         bool powered = getEnableAngularMotor();
00560         if(limit || powered)
00561         {
00562                 nrow++;
00563                 srow = nrow * info->rowskip;
00564                 info->m_J1angularAxis[srow+0] = ax1[0];
00565                 info->m_J1angularAxis[srow+1] = ax1[1];
00566                 info->m_J1angularAxis[srow+2] = ax1[2];
00567 
00568                 info->m_J2angularAxis[srow+0] = -ax1[0];
00569                 info->m_J2angularAxis[srow+1] = -ax1[1];
00570                 info->m_J2angularAxis[srow+2] = -ax1[2];
00571 
00572                 btScalar lostop = getLowerLimit();
00573                 btScalar histop = getUpperLimit();
00574                 if(limit && (lostop == histop))
00575                 {  // the joint motor is ineffective
00576                         powered = false;
00577                 }
00578                 info->m_constraintError[srow] = btScalar(0.0f);
00579                 btScalar currERP = (m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_STOP) ? m_stopERP : normalErp;
00580                 if(powered)
00581                 {
00582                         if(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_NORM)
00583                         {
00584                                 info->cfm[srow] = m_normalCFM;
00585                         }
00586                         btScalar mot_fact = getMotorFactor(m_hingeAngle, lostop, histop, m_motorTargetVelocity, info->fps * currERP);
00587                         info->m_constraintError[srow] += mot_fact * m_motorTargetVelocity * m_referenceSign;
00588                         info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = - m_maxMotorImpulse;
00589                         info->m_upperLimit[srow] =   m_maxMotorImpulse;
00590                 }
00591                 if(limit)
00592                 {
00593                         k = info->fps * currERP;
00594                         info->m_constraintError[srow] += k * limit_err;
00595                         if(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_STOP)
00596                         {
00597                                 info->cfm[srow] = m_stopCFM;
00598                         }
00599                         if(lostop == histop) 
00600                         {
00601                                 // limited low and high simultaneously
00602                                 info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = -SIMD_INFINITY;
00603                                 info->m_upperLimit[srow] = SIMD_INFINITY;
00604                         }
00605                         else if(limit == 1) 
00606                         { // low limit
00607                                 info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = 0;
00608                                 info->m_upperLimit[srow] = SIMD_INFINITY;
00609                         }
00610                         else 
00611                         { // high limit
00612                                 info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = -SIMD_INFINITY;
00613                                 info->m_upperLimit[srow] = 0;
00614                         }
00615                         // bounce (we'll use slider parameter abs(1.0 - m_dampingLimAng) for that)
00616 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00617                         btScalar bounce = m_limit.getRelaxationFactor();
00618 #else
00619                         btScalar bounce = m_relaxationFactor;
00620 #endif
00621                         if(bounce > btScalar(0.0))
00622                         {
00623                                 btScalar vel = angVelA.dot(ax1);
00624                                 vel -= angVelB.dot(ax1);
00625                                 // only apply bounce if the velocity is incoming, and if the
00626                                 // resulting c[] exceeds what we already have.
00627                                 if(limit == 1)
00628                                 {       // low limit
00629                                         if(vel < 0)
00630                                         {
00631                                                 btScalar newc = -bounce * vel;
00632                                                 if(newc > info->m_constraintError[srow])
00633                                                 {
00634                                                         info->m_constraintError[srow] = newc;
00635                                                 }
00636                                         }
00637                                 }
00638                                 else
00639                                 {       // high limit - all those computations are reversed
00640                                         if(vel > 0)
00641                                         {
00642                                                 btScalar newc = -bounce * vel;
00643                                                 if(newc < info->m_constraintError[srow])
00644                                                 {
00645                                                         info->m_constraintError[srow] = newc;
00646                                                 }
00647                                         }
00648                                 }
00649                         }
00650 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00651                         info->m_constraintError[srow] *= m_limit.getBiasFactor();
00652 #else
00653                         info->m_constraintError[srow] *= m_biasFactor;
00654 #endif
00655                 } // if(limit)
00656         } // if angular limit or powered
00657 }
00658 
00659 
00660 void btHingeConstraint::setFrames(const btTransform & frameA, const btTransform & frameB)
00661 {
00662         m_rbAFrame = frameA;
00663         m_rbBFrame = frameB;
00664         buildJacobian();
00665 }
00666 
00667 
00668 void    btHingeConstraint::updateRHS(btScalar   timeStep)
00669 {
00670         (void)timeStep;
00671 
00672 }
00673 
00674 
00675 
00676 
00677 btScalar btHingeConstraint::getHingeAngle()
00678 {
00679         return getHingeAngle(m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform());
00680 }
00681 
00682 btScalar btHingeConstraint::getHingeAngle(const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB)
00683 {
00684         const btVector3 refAxis0  = transA.getBasis() * m_rbAFrame.getBasis().getColumn(0);
00685         const btVector3 refAxis1  = transA.getBasis() * m_rbAFrame.getBasis().getColumn(1);
00686         const btVector3 swingAxis = transB.getBasis() * m_rbBFrame.getBasis().getColumn(1);
00687 //      btScalar angle = btAtan2Fast(swingAxis.dot(refAxis0), swingAxis.dot(refAxis1));
00688         btScalar angle = btAtan2(swingAxis.dot(refAxis0), swingAxis.dot(refAxis1));
00689         return m_referenceSign * angle;
00690 }
00691 
00692 
00693 
00694 void btHingeConstraint::testLimit(const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB)
00695 {
00696         // Compute limit information
00697         m_hingeAngle = getHingeAngle(transA,transB);
00698 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00699         m_limit.test(m_hingeAngle);
00700 #else
00701         m_correction = btScalar(0.);
00702         m_limitSign = btScalar(0.);
00703         m_solveLimit = false;
00704         if (m_lowerLimit <= m_upperLimit)
00705         {
00706                 m_hingeAngle = btAdjustAngleToLimits(m_hingeAngle, m_lowerLimit, m_upperLimit);
00707                 if (m_hingeAngle <= m_lowerLimit)
00708                 {
00709                         m_correction = (m_lowerLimit - m_hingeAngle);
00710                         m_limitSign = 1.0f;
00711                         m_solveLimit = true;
00712                 } 
00713                 else if (m_hingeAngle >= m_upperLimit)
00714                 {
00715                         m_correction = m_upperLimit - m_hingeAngle;
00716                         m_limitSign = -1.0f;
00717                         m_solveLimit = true;
00718                 }
00719         }
00720 #endif
00721         return;
00722 }
00723 
00724 
00725 static btVector3 vHinge(0, 0, btScalar(1));
00726 
00727 void btHingeConstraint::setMotorTarget(const btQuaternion& qAinB, btScalar dt)
00728 {
00729         // convert target from body to constraint space
00730         btQuaternion qConstraint = m_rbBFrame.getRotation().inverse() * qAinB * m_rbAFrame.getRotation();
00731         qConstraint.normalize();
00732 
00733         // extract "pure" hinge component
00734         btVector3 vNoHinge = quatRotate(qConstraint, vHinge); vNoHinge.normalize();
00735         btQuaternion qNoHinge = shortestArcQuat(vHinge, vNoHinge);
00736         btQuaternion qHinge = qNoHinge.inverse() * qConstraint;
00737         qHinge.normalize();
00738 
00739         // compute angular target, clamped to limits
00740         btScalar targetAngle = qHinge.getAngle();
00741         if (targetAngle > SIMD_PI) // long way around. flip quat and recalculate.
00742         {
00743                 qHinge = -(qHinge);
00744                 targetAngle = qHinge.getAngle();
00745         }
00746         if (qHinge.getZ() < 0)
00747                 targetAngle = -targetAngle;
00748 
00749         setMotorTarget(targetAngle, dt);
00750 }
00751 
00752 void btHingeConstraint::setMotorTarget(btScalar targetAngle, btScalar dt)
00753 {
00754 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00755         m_limit.fit(targetAngle);
00756 #else
00757         if (m_lowerLimit < m_upperLimit)
00758         {
00759                 if (targetAngle < m_lowerLimit)
00760                         targetAngle = m_lowerLimit;
00761                 else if (targetAngle > m_upperLimit)
00762                         targetAngle = m_upperLimit;
00763         }
00764 #endif
00765         // compute angular velocity
00766         btScalar curAngle  = getHingeAngle(m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform());
00767         btScalar dAngle = targetAngle - curAngle;
00768         m_motorTargetVelocity = dAngle / dt;
00769 }
00770 
00771 
00772 
00773 void btHingeConstraint::getInfo2InternalUsingFrameOffset(btConstraintInfo2* info, const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB,const btVector3& angVelA,const btVector3& angVelB)
00774 {
00775         btAssert(!m_useSolveConstraintObsolete);
00776         int i, s = info->rowskip;
00777         // transforms in world space
00778         btTransform trA = transA*m_rbAFrame;
00779         btTransform trB = transB*m_rbBFrame;
00780         // pivot point
00781 //      btVector3 pivotAInW = trA.getOrigin();
00782 //      btVector3 pivotBInW = trB.getOrigin();
00783 #if 1
00784         // difference between frames in WCS
00785         btVector3 ofs = trB.getOrigin() - trA.getOrigin();
00786         // now get weight factors depending on masses
00787         btScalar miA = getRigidBodyA().getInvMass();
00788         btScalar miB = getRigidBodyB().getInvMass();
00789         bool hasStaticBody = (miA < SIMD_EPSILON) || (miB < SIMD_EPSILON);
00790         btScalar miS = miA + miB;
00791         btScalar factA, factB;
00792         if(miS > btScalar(0.f))
00793         {
00794                 factA = miB / miS;
00795         }
00796         else 
00797         {
00798                 factA = btScalar(0.5f);
00799         }
00800         factB = btScalar(1.0f) - factA;
00801         // get the desired direction of hinge axis
00802         // as weighted sum of Z-orthos of frameA and frameB in WCS
00803         btVector3 ax1A = trA.getBasis().getColumn(2);
00804         btVector3 ax1B = trB.getBasis().getColumn(2);
00805         btVector3 ax1 = ax1A * factA + ax1B * factB;
00806         ax1.normalize();
00807         // fill first 3 rows 
00808         // we want: velA + wA x relA == velB + wB x relB
00809         btTransform bodyA_trans = transA;
00810         btTransform bodyB_trans = transB;
00811         int s0 = 0;
00812         int s1 = s;
00813         int s2 = s * 2;
00814         int nrow = 2; // last filled row
00815         btVector3 tmpA, tmpB, relA, relB, p, q;
00816         // get vector from bodyB to frameB in WCS
00817         relB = trB.getOrigin() - bodyB_trans.getOrigin();
00818         // get its projection to hinge axis
00819         btVector3 projB = ax1 * relB.dot(ax1);
00820         // get vector directed from bodyB to hinge axis (and orthogonal to it)
00821         btVector3 orthoB = relB - projB;
00822         // same for bodyA
00823         relA = trA.getOrigin() - bodyA_trans.getOrigin();
00824         btVector3 projA = ax1 * relA.dot(ax1);
00825         btVector3 orthoA = relA - projA;
00826         btVector3 totalDist = projA - projB;
00827         // get offset vectors relA and relB
00828         relA = orthoA + totalDist * factA;
00829         relB = orthoB - totalDist * factB;
00830         // now choose average ortho to hinge axis
00831         p = orthoB * factA + orthoA * factB;
00832         btScalar len2 = p.length2();
00833         if(len2 > SIMD_EPSILON)
00834         {
00835                 p /= btSqrt(len2);
00836         }
00837         else
00838         {
00839                 p = trA.getBasis().getColumn(1);
00840         }
00841         // make one more ortho
00842         q = ax1.cross(p);
00843         // fill three rows
00844         tmpA = relA.cross(p);
00845         tmpB = relB.cross(p);
00846     for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J1angularAxis[s0+i] = tmpA[i];
00847     for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J2angularAxis[s0+i] = -tmpB[i];
00848         tmpA = relA.cross(q);
00849         tmpB = relB.cross(q);
00850         if(hasStaticBody && getSolveLimit())
00851         { // to make constraint between static and dynamic objects more rigid
00852                 // remove wA (or wB) from equation if angular limit is hit
00853                 tmpB *= factB;
00854                 tmpA *= factA;
00855         }
00856         for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J1angularAxis[s1+i] = tmpA[i];
00857     for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J2angularAxis[s1+i] = -tmpB[i];
00858         tmpA = relA.cross(ax1);
00859         tmpB = relB.cross(ax1);
00860         if(hasStaticBody)
00861         { // to make constraint between static and dynamic objects more rigid
00862                 // remove wA (or wB) from equation
00863                 tmpB *= factB;
00864                 tmpA *= factA;
00865         }
00866         for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J1angularAxis[s2+i] = tmpA[i];
00867     for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J2angularAxis[s2+i] = -tmpB[i];
00868 
00869         btScalar normalErp = (m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_NORM)? m_normalERP : info->erp;
00870         btScalar k = info->fps * normalErp;
00871 
00872         if (!m_angularOnly)
00873         {
00874                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J1linearAxis[s0+i] = p[i];
00875                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J1linearAxis[s1+i] = q[i];
00876                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J1linearAxis[s2+i] = ax1[i];
00877 
00878                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J2linearAxis[s0+i] = -p[i];
00879                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J2linearAxis[s1+i] = -q[i];
00880                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) info->m_J2linearAxis[s2+i] = -ax1[i];
00881 
00882         // compute three elements of right hand side
00883         
00884                 btScalar rhs = k * p.dot(ofs);
00885                 info->m_constraintError[s0] = rhs;
00886                 rhs = k * q.dot(ofs);
00887                 info->m_constraintError[s1] = rhs;
00888                 rhs = k * ax1.dot(ofs);
00889                 info->m_constraintError[s2] = rhs;
00890         }
00891         // the hinge axis should be the only unconstrained
00892         // rotational axis, the angular velocity of the two bodies perpendicular to
00893         // the hinge axis should be equal. thus the constraint equations are
00894         //    p*w1 - p*w2 = 0
00895         //    q*w1 - q*w2 = 0
00896         // where p and q are unit vectors normal to the hinge axis, and w1 and w2
00897         // are the angular velocity vectors of the two bodies.
00898         int s3 = 3 * s;
00899         int s4 = 4 * s;
00900         info->m_J1angularAxis[s3 + 0] = p[0];
00901         info->m_J1angularAxis[s3 + 1] = p[1];
00902         info->m_J1angularAxis[s3 + 2] = p[2];
00903         info->m_J1angularAxis[s4 + 0] = q[0];
00904         info->m_J1angularAxis[s4 + 1] = q[1];
00905         info->m_J1angularAxis[s4 + 2] = q[2];
00906 
00907         info->m_J2angularAxis[s3 + 0] = -p[0];
00908         info->m_J2angularAxis[s3 + 1] = -p[1];
00909         info->m_J2angularAxis[s3 + 2] = -p[2];
00910         info->m_J2angularAxis[s4 + 0] = -q[0];
00911         info->m_J2angularAxis[s4 + 1] = -q[1];
00912         info->m_J2angularAxis[s4 + 2] = -q[2];
00913         // compute the right hand side of the constraint equation. set relative
00914         // body velocities along p and q to bring the hinge back into alignment.
00915         // if ax1A,ax1B are the unit length hinge axes as computed from bodyA and
00916         // bodyB, we need to rotate both bodies along the axis u = (ax1 x ax2).
00917         // if "theta" is the angle between ax1 and ax2, we need an angular velocity
00918         // along u to cover angle erp*theta in one step :
00919         //   |angular_velocity| = angle/time = erp*theta / stepsize
00920         //                      = (erp*fps) * theta
00921         //    angular_velocity  = |angular_velocity| * (ax1 x ax2) / |ax1 x ax2|
00922         //                      = (erp*fps) * theta * (ax1 x ax2) / sin(theta)
00923         // ...as ax1 and ax2 are unit length. if theta is smallish,
00924         // theta ~= sin(theta), so
00925         //    angular_velocity  = (erp*fps) * (ax1 x ax2)
00926         // ax1 x ax2 is in the plane space of ax1, so we project the angular
00927         // velocity to p and q to find the right hand side.
00928         k = info->fps * normalErp;//??
00929 
00930         btVector3 u = ax1A.cross(ax1B);
00931         info->m_constraintError[s3] = k * u.dot(p);
00932         info->m_constraintError[s4] = k * u.dot(q);
00933 #endif
00934         // check angular limits
00935         nrow = 4; // last filled row
00936         int srow;
00937         btScalar limit_err = btScalar(0.0);
00938         int limit = 0;
00939         if(getSolveLimit())
00940         {
00941 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00942         limit_err = m_limit.getCorrection() * m_referenceSign;
00943 #else
00944         limit_err = m_correction * m_referenceSign;
00945 #endif
00946         limit = (limit_err > btScalar(0.0)) ? 1 : 2;
00947 
00948         }
00949         // if the hinge has joint limits or motor, add in the extra row
00950         bool powered = getEnableAngularMotor();
00951         if(limit || powered)
00952         {
00953                 nrow++;
00954                 srow = nrow * info->rowskip;
00955                 info->m_J1angularAxis[srow+0] = ax1[0];
00956                 info->m_J1angularAxis[srow+1] = ax1[1];
00957                 info->m_J1angularAxis[srow+2] = ax1[2];
00958 
00959                 info->m_J2angularAxis[srow+0] = -ax1[0];
00960                 info->m_J2angularAxis[srow+1] = -ax1[1];
00961                 info->m_J2angularAxis[srow+2] = -ax1[2];
00962 
00963                 btScalar lostop = getLowerLimit();
00964                 btScalar histop = getUpperLimit();
00965                 if(limit && (lostop == histop))
00966                 {  // the joint motor is ineffective
00967                         powered = false;
00968                 }
00969                 info->m_constraintError[srow] = btScalar(0.0f);
00970                 btScalar currERP = (m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_STOP) ? m_stopERP : normalErp;
00971                 if(powered)
00972                 {
00973                         if(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_NORM)
00974                         {
00975                                 info->cfm[srow] = m_normalCFM;
00976                         }
00977                         btScalar mot_fact = getMotorFactor(m_hingeAngle, lostop, histop, m_motorTargetVelocity, info->fps * currERP);
00978                         info->m_constraintError[srow] += mot_fact * m_motorTargetVelocity * m_referenceSign;
00979                         info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = - m_maxMotorImpulse;
00980                         info->m_upperLimit[srow] =   m_maxMotorImpulse;
00981                 }
00982                 if(limit)
00983                 {
00984                         k = info->fps * currERP;
00985                         info->m_constraintError[srow] += k * limit_err;
00986                         if(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_STOP)
00987                         {
00988                                 info->cfm[srow] = m_stopCFM;
00989                         }
00990                         if(lostop == histop) 
00991                         {
00992                                 // limited low and high simultaneously
00993                                 info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = -SIMD_INFINITY;
00994                                 info->m_upperLimit[srow] = SIMD_INFINITY;
00995                         }
00996                         else if(limit == 1) 
00997                         { // low limit
00998                                 info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = 0;
00999                                 info->m_upperLimit[srow] = SIMD_INFINITY;
01000                         }
01001                         else 
01002                         { // high limit
01003                                 info->m_lowerLimit[srow] = -SIMD_INFINITY;
01004                                 info->m_upperLimit[srow] = 0;
01005                         }
01006                         // bounce (we'll use slider parameter abs(1.0 - m_dampingLimAng) for that)
01007 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
01008                         btScalar bounce = m_limit.getRelaxationFactor();
01009 #else
01010                         btScalar bounce = m_relaxationFactor;
01011 #endif
01012                         if(bounce > btScalar(0.0))
01013                         {
01014                                 btScalar vel = angVelA.dot(ax1);
01015                                 vel -= angVelB.dot(ax1);
01016                                 // only apply bounce if the velocity is incoming, and if the
01017                                 // resulting c[] exceeds what we already have.
01018                                 if(limit == 1)
01019                                 {       // low limit
01020                                         if(vel < 0)
01021                                         {
01022                                                 btScalar newc = -bounce * vel;
01023                                                 if(newc > info->m_constraintError[srow])
01024                                                 {
01025                                                         info->m_constraintError[srow] = newc;
01026                                                 }
01027                                         }
01028                                 }
01029                                 else
01030                                 {       // high limit - all those computations are reversed
01031                                         if(vel > 0)
01032                                         {
01033                                                 btScalar newc = -bounce * vel;
01034                                                 if(newc < info->m_constraintError[srow])
01035                                                 {
01036                                                         info->m_constraintError[srow] = newc;
01037                                                 }
01038                                         }
01039                                 }
01040                         }
01041 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
01042                         info->m_constraintError[srow] *= m_limit.getBiasFactor();
01043 #else
01044                         info->m_constraintError[srow] *= m_biasFactor;
01045 #endif
01046                 } // if(limit)
01047         } // if angular limit or powered
01048 }
01049 
01050 
01053 void btHingeConstraint::setParam(int num, btScalar value, int axis)
01054 {
01055         if((axis == -1) || (axis == 5))
01056         {
01057                 switch(num)
01058                 {       
01059                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_STOP_ERP :
01060                                 m_stopERP = value;
01061                                 m_flags |= BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_STOP;
01062                                 break;
01063                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_STOP_CFM :
01064                                 m_stopCFM = value;
01065                                 m_flags |= BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_STOP;
01066                                 break;
01067                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_CFM :
01068                                 m_normalCFM = value;
01069                                 m_flags |= BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_NORM;
01070                                 break;
01071                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_ERP:
01072                                 m_normalERP = value;
01073                                 m_flags |= BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_NORM;
01074                                 break;
01075                         default : 
01076                                 btAssertConstrParams(0);
01077                 }
01078         }
01079         else
01080         {
01081                 btAssertConstrParams(0);
01082         }
01083 }
01084 
01086 btScalar btHingeConstraint::getParam(int num, int axis) const 
01087 {
01088         btScalar retVal = 0;
01089         if((axis == -1) || (axis == 5))
01090         {
01091                 switch(num)
01092                 {       
01093                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_STOP_ERP :
01094                                 btAssertConstrParams(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_STOP);
01095                                 retVal = m_stopERP;
01096                                 break;
01097                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_STOP_CFM :
01098                                 btAssertConstrParams(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_STOP);
01099                                 retVal = m_stopCFM;
01100                                 break;
01101                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_CFM :
01102                                 btAssertConstrParams(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_CFM_NORM);
01103                                 retVal = m_normalCFM;
01104                                 break;
01105                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_ERP:
01106                                 btAssertConstrParams(m_flags & BT_HINGE_FLAGS_ERP_NORM);
01107                                 retVal = m_normalERP;
01108                                 break;
01109                         default : 
01110                                 btAssertConstrParams(0);
01111                 }
01112         }
01113         else
01114         {
01115                 btAssertConstrParams(0);
01116         }
01117         return retVal;
01118 }
